description:
Kizuna is declared the captain of the megafloat`s defense squad: the Amaterasu.  For his mission, he`s sent to an uninhabited island to scan for needed resources.  But what was supposed to be a safe mission turns dangerous when a miscalculation sends them right into a Magitech ambush.  Kizuna`s Eros gear is dangerously underpowered, and Yurishia is running desperately low on energy...
Source: crunchyroll
